name: fuzzy-matching
short_description: The fuzzy-matching library provides an OmniMark pattern function that attempts to approximately match the input prefix against any of the given target strings. The allowed Damerau–Levenshtein distance from each target string is user-specified. This distance equals the minimum number of character deletions, insertions, replacements, and transpositions required to transform the target string into the input. Each of the four transformations can be individually weighed or completely disallowed.
summary: Fuzzy and streaming matching of string sets
